alert.note: Alert for City of Hampton; City of Poquoson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:01PM EDT until June 16 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL ISLE OF WIGHT...AND SOUTHEASTERN YORK COUNTIES...THE CITY OF POQUOSON...THE CITY OF HAMPTON AND THE CENTRAL CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS... At 501 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Langley AFB, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Hampton around 505 PM EDT. Hampton University around 510 PM EDT. Grand View and Buckroe Beach around 515 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Fox Hill, Carrollton, Phoebus, Langley View, Oriana, Hilton Village, Raleigh Terrace, Dare, Oyster Point and Messick. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Hampton; City of Poquoson
